H0.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Daws Butler

H1.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Don Messick

H2.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. June Foray

H3.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Mel Blanc

A4.text: In 1961, Daws Butler substituted for Mel Blanc to voice Barney Rubble in five episodes of The Flintstones.

A5.text: Daws Butler had previously voiced the characters of Fred Flintstone and Barney Rubble in the 90-second pilot for the series (when it was called The Flagstones).

A7.text: Daws Butler provided the voice of Barney Rubble for a few episodes of The Flintstones when Mel Blanc was absent.

A8.text: On The Flintstones, in addition to many episodic characters and creatures, he voiced Bamm-Bamm Rubble, Hoppy the hopparoo, and Arnold the paper boy.

A9.text: June Foray and Hanna-Barbera regular Daws Butler voiced the characters for the demonstration film
